text:
There should be a simple way to setup per-webapp stdout/stderr logging. For instance if I have the following Host's and desired logging setup.

app1.myapp.com - $CATALINA_HOME/logs/app1.myapp.com.out
app2.myapp.com - $CATALINA_HOME/logs/app2.myapp.com.out
app3.myapp.com - $CATALINA_HOME/logs/app3.myapp.com.out

There seems to be no obvious answer in the documentation for how to achieve this. This can be done easily in other containers ie Resin.
creator: rkeiii@gmail.com
